meanings.sent1: The student stared distractedly out the window instead of studying.
meanings.sent2: She answered the question distractedly, not really listening.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked distractedly at the squirrel, then forgot about it.

meanings.sent5: He drove distractedly, almost missing his turn.
